code: import React from'react';import{FiSmile,FiMeh,FiFrown}from'react-icons/fi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SentimentIndicator=_ref=>{let{sentiment}=_ref;const getSentimentIcon=()=>{switch(sentiment){case'positive':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiSmile,{className:"text-green-500 text-xl"});case'neutral':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiMeh,{className:"text-yellow-500 text-xl"});case'negative':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiFrown,{className:"text-red-500 text-xl"});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiMeh,{className:"text-gray-500 text-xl"});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[getSentimentIcon(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"ml-1 text-sm capitalize",children:sentiment})]});};export default SentimentIndicator;
